author: Christal Andrews

resources.description:
Easy  and most  persuasive   system  of Jesus   instructions on how to solve  problems  in  lifetime . 


If you got stuck in a situation , if the road  of  lifetime   seems like a dead end road   to you spiritually:

 Stop  striving , quit  fighting,  give up arguing .

and

 Begin  to love.  Passion is God 's true  nature,  Passion is your  genuine nature, because you are  daughter or son of  our heavenly father  - made to his  prototype . 

 Resume  your  life time   as you were reincarnating at this point  of  lifetime . Learn  from past  scenarios, from past " errors ", do something new and different by applying  all the  piled up  experiences of your past. Learn   to watch your past mistakes  as of  deterrents example  that you failed   to appreciate or  to understand  successfully rather than calling  them " faults". There are but learning  situations  in  incarnation  - never can there be any true  fault - only missed  object lessons. Remember  what  one does  at  college when you  miss an  examination  - you learn more  and  do again the topic  until you pass   in a fashion that satisfies you. All  lifespan  serves  but  to explain you how to behave   as an adult  and Divine   Daughter or son of  our heavenly father  - made to his  paradigm !

Just  keeping in mind  what  rebirth  does to  humans  -  it offers  all of us another  opportunity,  over and over again . We ourselves  get rid of our past and the past of all others,  including all of our " opponents "  let go of  our past. We keep the essence of our past experiences  and obtain  another  possibility   to boost  and  acquire even more . To  acquire to love and  manage  all  scenarios  with  Passion. 

If  fail to know any further. 

If you feel like  in a one way road  and you can't  see any  possibility of  return  or  modify direction  of your "destiny " - give  the  emergency to  heavenly father , ask him in a prayer to dissolve  the  problem and  begin loving yourself and all your Divine  sisters. Yes, all others  are your sisters - because they all are  offspring of God . And  as they are  children  of  supreme being ,  they are definitely  sacred. As  sacred as your  genuine [nature] (//www.1337x.org/torrent/400783/0/ "nature") is.  Acknowledge to them all the right to make  errors , because they  each of them is  learning  to love. And they all are improving  day after day  .  Render  them tomorrow  the prospect  and the right to  comport  and act  otherwise than they did  this very day, yesterday or the days before. They all may have learned   a great deal  and may  just be waiting to  use  what they have  acquired. 

Always  keeping in mind  - the only important  lesson  in  life time  is to  acquire to love in any and all  situations of life . It 's the most valuable , the most  treasured  gift  that you can ever return  to  our all heavenly father - your  Passion. 

If  you desire to go to court  against someone:

 Dismiss your cause,  Surrender it to  our heavenly creator  and  emphasize on   passion. 

Your ego  only  could possibly be   pained  by  violative actions  or words  of others - never your  psyche - your true  being. Others however may help you to learn loving in all   situations. They may do so by  harassing  you, by  pointing you your weak point  in your behavior , they are  instructing you and  aiding you. Be thankful  they  exhibited  you another area to improve , another step to  get close to    supreme being . Thus they may turn out to  be your best  allies without you knowing and  realising it at all  . 

 Here is more information in regards to [Learn Kriya Yoga and Gods Teachings of Love] (//www.1337x.org/torrent/400783/0/ "Learn Kriya Yoga and Gods Teachings of Love"). If someone is  struggling you and  you intend to  defend  yourself:

 Dismiss it - stop  defending  yourself - defense  is an aggressive reaction to   hostility. Defense is  hostility -  just about anything  the cause. Your defensive reaction   in all likelihood   can result in  another  cause and effect for you to  endure any time later.  Passion can never even be  affected  by aggression . Learn  to " take in  and dissolve " aggressive  actions , words  or thoughts  coming from others toward you in your  evolving  Love  within, these are but what you have "distributed " among others in early  days of your  today;s  or any  former  lifetime . The more you dissolve these aggressions from others by just continuing to love  progressively and asking  supreme being   to help you in  meliorating the quality, the  pureness of your Love , the less " ammo" others will have, because your  cause and effect is melting down in the fire  of your continuous   heavenly  Love  toward all  hostile  scenarios. 

Keep your mind  and your emotions  stuffed with   Passion - pure ,  heavenly   Passion. Keep concentrating on God  and his  endless Bliss and Love   for yourself  and act as a channel of this  heavenly  Love  to all the persons  involved  in this particular situation . 

If don't know  how to react at all  . 

Love!

It's always  correct to  love and it always  solves . Just  apply it  with all the  strength  of your heart and all the  force  of your soul and pray to  our all heavenly father  assist you to  practise   Passion  24/7/365. God  is the source  of all  Passion  which includes  all love  you  render  to others or you receive  from others. 

Love  is the  answer , the end to all your problems . Once you have learned  to truly love like a  son or daughter of  heavenly father , there  will likely be  no more need for problems  to arise  in your  incarnation , because you have  acquired to love. 

The only purpose  of any kind of    troubles  to take place  in your  life time  is to  educate you on  loving. The  troubles may keep coming  time and again as long as you keep  fighting back , struggling,  fencing. 

 Commence loving  this very day and keep  amending  day after day   until you  excel . Be a  heavenly  Child  of  [our heavenly father] (//www.1337x.org/torrent/400783/0/ "our heavenly father")   and luxuriate in a life   loaded with  Divine   Passion.
